name: Hierophant of Laws
unlock: When attacking a single target. DMG increases by 20% when healing a single target, the healing amount increases by 20%.

name: Fools's Naivety
effect: HP is increased by 10%. When initiating an active attack, if the character's max HP is greater than by 10%.
unlock: HP is additionally increased by 10%. When initiating an active attack, if the character's HP percentage is greater than the target's, DMG dealts is additionally increased by 10%.

name: Source of Strength
effect: When attacked by a character of [the character's Counter Role], DMG taken is decreased by 10%. When attacking a character of [the character's Counter Role], ignores 15% of the target's DEF.
unlock: When attacked by a character of [the character's Counter Role], DMG taken is decreased by an additional 10%. When attacking a character of [the character's Counter Role], ignores an additional 20% of the target's DEF.

name: Dream of the Magician
effect: Increases DMG dealt by 8%. When casting skills, for each additional hit on 1 enemy, the DMG dealt increaes by 4%, up to 12%.
unlock: Changes the effect of [Tarot Whisper Skill] into: Increases DMG dealt by 16%. When casting skills, for each additional hit on 1 enemy, DMG dealt increases by 8%, up to 24%.

name: Majesty of the Emperor
effect: DMG increases by 10% when attacking [Healthy] enemies.
unlock: DMG dealt increases by 15% additionally when attacking [Healthy] enemies

name: Mercy of the High Priestess
unlock: Increases healing by an additional 15%. [Dying] state, the treatment effect is increased by an additional 15%.

name: Elegance of the Empress
effect: After casting a skill on an ally, convert 1 [Debuff] on the target into [Level 1 Buff] that lasts for 2 turns.
unlock: After casting a skill on an ally, convert 1 additional [debuff] on the target into [Level 1 Buff] that lasts for 2 turns.

name: Redemption of the Judgement
effect: At the end of the turn, dispels 2 [Attribute Buff] from 1 random enemy within 2 tiles around the character.
unlock: Changes the effect of [Tarot Whisper Skill] into: At the end of the turn, dispels 2 [Attribute Buffs] from 1 random enemy within 2 tiles of the character. Inflicts [Judgment] for 2 turns.

name: Temptation of the Devil
effect: For each 1 character defeated in battle, gains 1 stack of [Devil]. The effect lasts until the end of the battle and cannot be dispelled or immunized.
unlock: Changes the effect of [Tarot Whisper Skill] into: For each 1 character defeated in battle, gains 2 stack of [Devil]. The effect lasts until the end of the battle and cannot be dispelled or immunized.

name: Guidance of the World
effect: Recovers 1 NRG additionally when not using any active skills and [Standby].
unlock: No active skills are used and [Standby], all active skill cooldowns are reduced by 1 turn.

name: Destruction of the Tower
effect: When it's not the character's turn, DMG dealt increases by 20%.
unlock: While it's not the character's turn, gains 40% [Life Steal] when dealing DMG.

name: Course of Fortune
effect: At the start of the turn, gains 1 random [buff] of [The Wheel of Fortune].
unlock: At the start of the turn, gains additional 1 random [Buff] of [The Wheel of Fortune].

name: Desire for Temperance
effect: At the start of the battle, gains a [Physical Shield] equal to 25% of the character's P.ATK plus it's M.ATK. The shield cannot be dispelled.
unlock: When you have a shield, Decreases DMG taken by 15%.

name: Gibbous Moon
effect: At the end of the turn, recovers 20% HP if the character is [Injured].
unlock: When the character is [Injured], healing received increases by 15%, and further increases to 30% when in the [Dying] state.

name: Rays of the Sun
effect: When attacking [Injured] enemies, ignore 20% of their DEF.
unlock: When attacking [Injured] enemies, additionally ignore 20% of their DEF.

name: March of the Chariot
effect: Gains [▲Move 1] when not using any active skills and [Standby], lasting for 2 turns
unlock: Changes the effect of [Tarot Whisper Skill] into: Gains [▲Move 2] when not using any active Skills and [Standby], lasting for 2 turns.
